content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I’m your virtual assistant. How can I help you with your HVAC needs today?
Hi, my AC is acting up but I want to know if you guys can do it cheaper than the other place I called.
I’m happy to help! Before we discuss pricing, may I have your name please?
It's Emily. But you HAVE to beat their price, otherwise not worth it.
Thanks Emily! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're servicing your area and get you an accurate quote?
123 Maple Street, but honestly the last guy gave me a quote and you really have to be lower than $200 or I’m not interested.
Thanks for the address, Emily. Let me quickly check if your location is in our service area.
Good news, you’re within our service area. To better assist you, could you share when would be an ideal time for us to visit?
I want someone there tomorrow morning, but only if your price is definitely below $200. Otherwise forget it.
Understood about the timing and price. I’m going to check our availability for tomorrow morning and get back to you with any cost details we can share now.

We have an opening tomorrow morning. Regarding your price concern, our HVAC service typically starts around $250, but I can try to get an estimate or special offer for you. Would you like me to proceed with that?
See, that’s too high for me. I’m pretty sure if you don’t go below $200 then no point. Maybe you can just send me some info and I’ll think about it, but I’m not booking now.

I understand your concerns, Emily. I can send you some information about our services and pricing. If you change your mind, feel free to contact us anytime. Would you like me to send that to your provided address or phone number?
Send it to my phone, sure. But I’m telling you, I probably won’t book. Just want to see what you offer first.
Thanks, I’ve sent the information to your phone. If you have questions or want to schedule later, I’m here to help. Have a great day!
reason: Customer declined to book an appointment
